explains: adj. 不识字的，文盲的；行文拙劣的，不通顺的；（对某个学科）无知的，不了解的

sentences.en: Most 11-year-olds are not encouraged to develop reading skills; a small but significant number are illiterate.
sentences.cn: 大多数11岁的儿童没有被鼓励去培养阅读技能。有为数不多、但足以引起人们注意的数目的儿童是文盲。

sentences.en: Nearly a billion people are illiterate.
Try to imagine your life being illiterate.
sentences.cn: 试着想象你过着一种文盲的生活。
